title: Gooday's Bad Page
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:basalt darkmode=a]]

[[module CSS]]
:root {
 --borderColor: (#008080) !important;
 --bgBadgeColor: (#F3F4F7) !important;
}

/* WANDERERS" LIBRARY CSS */
@import url("https://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/component:dustjacket-theme-typefaces/code/1");
@import url("https://use.typekit.net/tqr1skr.css");

.library-container {
    --library-gold: 255, 219, 90;
    --library-dkgreen: 45, 70, 45;
    position: relative;
    overflow: hidden;
    -webkit-border-radius: 2rem;
       -moz-border-radius: 2rem;
            border-radius: 2rem;
}

.library-container::before {
    content: "";
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    z-index: 1;
    pointer-events: none;
    -webkit-border-radius: 3rem;
       -moz-border-radius: 3rem;
            border-radius: 3rem;
    background-image: -webkit-linear-gradient(285deg,
     rgba(var(--library-gold), 1),
     rgba(var(--library-gold), 0.3) 40%,
     transparent 40%,
     transparent 50%,
     rgba(var(--library-gold), 0.8) 52%,
     rgba(var(--library-gold), 0.4) 70%,
     transparent 70%);
    background-image: -moz-linear-gradient(285deg,
     rgba(var(--library-gold), 1),
     rgba(var(--library-gold), 0.3) 40%,
     transparent 40%,
     transparent 50%,
     rgba(var(--library-gold), 0.8) 52%,
     rgba(var(--library-gold), 0.4) 70%,
     transparent 70%);
    background-image: -o-linear-gradient(285deg,
     rgba(var(--library-gold), 1),
     rgba(var(--library-gold), 0.3) 40%,
     transparent 40%,
     transparent 50%,
     rgba(var(--library-gold), 0.8) 52%,
     rgba(var(--library-gold), 0.4) 70%,
     transparent 70%);
    background-image: linear-gradient(165deg,
     rgba(var(--library-gold), 1),
     rgba(var(--library-gold), 0.3) 40%,
     transparent 40%,
     transparent 50%,
     rgba(var(--library-gold), 0.8) 52%,
     rgba(var(--library-gold), 0.4) 70%,
     transparent 70%);
    opacity: 0;
    background-position: -10rem -5rem;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    -webkit-filter: blur(0.25rem);
            filter: blur(0.25rem);
    -webkit-transition:
     opacity 600ms cubic-bezier(.45, .05, .55, .95),
     background-position 600ms cubic-bezier(.79, .14, .15, .86) 300ms;
    -o-transition:
     opacity 600ms cubic-bezier(.45, .05, .55, .95),
     background-position 600ms cubic-bezier(.79, .14, .15, .86) 300ms;
    -moz-transition:
     opacity 600ms cubic-bezier(.45, .05, .55, .95),
     background-position 600ms cubic-bezier(.79, .14, .15, .86) 300ms;
    transition:
     opacity 600ms cubic-bezier(.45, .05, .55, .95),
     background-position 600ms cubic-bezier(.79, .14, .15, .86) 300ms;
}

.library-container:hover::before {
    opacity: 0.15;
    background-position: 0 0;
    -webkit-transition:
     opacity 300ms cubic-bezier(.45, .05, .55, .95) 300ms,
     background-position 600ms cubic-bezier(.79, .14, .15, .86);
    -o-transition:
     opacity 300ms cubic-bezier(.45, .05, .55, .95) 300ms,
     background-position 600ms cubic-bezier(.79, .14, .15, .86);
    -moz-transition:
     opacity 300ms cubic-bezier(.45, .05, .55, .95) 300ms,
     background-position 600ms cubic-bezier(.79, .14, .15, .86);
    transition:
     opacity 300ms cubic-bezier(.45, .05, .55, .95) 300ms,
     background-position 600ms cubic-bezier(.79, .14, .15, .86);
}

.library {
     "wl-image wl-header"
     "wl-image wl-text";
    -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
       -moz-box-sizing: border-box;
            box-sizing: border-box;
    border: 1.25rem solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
    -webkit-border-image: url("https://wanderers-library.wdfiles.com/local--files/component%3Adustjacket-theme/wl_border.png") 600 round;
       -moz-border-image: url("https://wanderers-library.wdfiles.com/local--files/component%3Adustjacket-theme/wl_border.png") 600 round;
         -o-border-image: url("https://wanderers-library.wdfiles.com/local--files/component%3Adustjacket-theme/wl_border.png") 600 round;
            border-image: url("https://wanderers-library.wdfiles.com/local--files/component%3Adustjacket-theme/wl_border.png") 600 round;
    border-image-width: 6;
    background: url("https://wanderers-library.wdfiles.com/local--files/component%3Atheme/wlheader_bg.png");
    -webkit-border-radius: 2rem;
       -moz-border-radius: 2rem;
            border-radius: 2rem;
    padding: 0.5rem;
    color: rgb(var(--library-gold));
    font-family: adelle-sans, sans-serif;
    font-size: 1.15em;
    overflow: hidden;
}
[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include component:fundraiser-widget amt= 2170
 |goal= 8000
 |title= Help Daisy Move Out!
 |main_url= https://www.gofundme.com/f/4u4wx-help-daisy-move-out?utm_campaign=p_nacp+share-sheet&utm_medium=copy_link&utm_source=customer
 |curr_sym=$|num_sep=,
 |image_url= none
 |donate_url= none
 |logo_text= @@@@
 |description= Hello all, my partner Daisy is currently living in an extremely awful environment with their mother, facing physical, emotional, and mental abuse such as destruction of personal belongings, seizing of wages, gaslighting, etc. from this awful woman. 

Because of this we have set up a fundraiser in order to get them out as soon as physically possible and into a safer and more stable living space. If you are able any donation or even just spreading the word would be greatly appreciated. 

Thank you. 
 ]]

**DISCLAIMER** (last updated December 18th, 2022)
As required by the [[[donations-policy|SCP Wiki Official Donations Policy]]].
* Payment services may reveal information such as your real name, email address, and other personal information when you donate.

[[tabview]]
[[tab Personnel File]]

[[div class="modal"]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]

[[=]]
+++ I'm currently in the process of rewriting this to better reflect my vision of the character, feel free to ignore this for now!
[[/=]]

[[/div]]

-----

[[include component:image-block
    name=800px-XXth-conference-of-Gazprom's-young-scientists_17.jpg|
    caption=Dr. Gooday during Medical Orientation, circa 2012.]]

**Name:** Dr. Jack Gooday MD

**Security Clearance** Lvl. 2

**Position:** Junior Medical Personnel

**Location:** Site-473

**Description:** General surgeon and certified pathologist. Although hardworking, Dr. Gooday has been described by his fellow personnel as quiet and antisocial, preferring to work alone or with individuals, he knows well. He has also been described as quote: "extremely boring".

Due to a lack of training and general lack of experience on the subject, Dr. Gooday's medical duties on any ontokinetic, thaumaturgical, or otherwise anomalous entities have been significantly limited.

[[collapsible show="+Access: Level 3 Clearance Documentation" hide="-Leave: Level 3 Clearance Documentation"]]
[[=]]
-----
+ __[NOTICE]__
The following information has been classified LEVEL 3+ Confidential. If you have entered this file by mistake, please contact your on-site RAISA representative. Any unauthorized personnel found purposely viewing the following data without proper clearance will face disciplinary actions.

You have been warned.
-----
[[/=]]
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@
@@@@

**Description:** Dr. Jack Gooday is a Class-II Reality Sink. Negating or at minimum severely dampening the anomalous effects of paranormal entities within a fluctuating area of effect (which has so far been documented as being as little as fifteen centimeters up to a maximum of five meters) over an extended period of time.

Due to this Dr. Gooday's medical duties on any ontokinetic, thaumaturgical, or otherwise anomalous entities have been significantly limited, any involvement with anomalous entities or personnel are to be under the preview of the acting Site-473 director.
[[/collapsible]]
[[/div]]
   
[[/tab]]

[[tab SCP Files]]

++++ Written With [[*user DodoDevil]], [[*user LORDXVNV]], [[*user Lan 2D]], and [[*user Impperatrix]]

[[module ListPages created_by="DodoDevil" separate="no" tags="+co-authored, +poetry, +tale" perPage="10" order="created_at" prependLine="||~ Tale ||~ Created ||~ Rating ||~ Comments ||"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || %%created_at%% || %%rating%% || %%comments%%  ||
[[/module]]


[[/tab]]

[[tab Beyond the Foundation]]

[[div class="library-container"]]
[[div class="library"]]

"Beyond the cursed halls of the Foundation lays several stories not confined within it's walls. People, places, things, entire concepts that remain unknown to even the most astute researcher. These stories lie here, abandoned and forgotten by their reality. These stories have found their way here, into your caring hands. Be it from divine intervention or the wills of the universe, It simply doesn't matter; they're waiting for you, friend. Get to reading." The lone author exclaims.

With a quiet grunt the author stood, his hands gently gripping a sturdy mahogany cane. He looks at you with a grin as he gestures to the book filled table.

"After all, they're not going to read themselves."

* [http://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/if-they-have-eyes "If They Have Eyes"]
* [https://wanderers-library.wikidot.com/defective "Gone"]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Others]]

[[module ListPages created_by="DrGooday" separate="no" tags="artist, hub, author, theme, artwork" perPage="10" order="created_at" prependLine="||~ Other ||~ Created ||~ Rating ||~ Comments ||"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || %%created_at%% || %%rating%% || %%comments%%  ||
[[/module]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Author Commentary]]

[[collapsible show="+Access File: Secure_Contain_Pixelate.png " hide="-Leave File: Secure_Contain_Pixelate.png"]]

[[div class="notation" style="margin: 1rem auto 1rem auto;"]]

**File Designation:** Secure, Contain, Pixelate

**Memetic Inoculation:** [*https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SJwh3erQlyE (♫)] - Pictionary Title Screen

**File Passphrase:** "Just try not to touch anything, the pixels are quite sharp"

**File Description:** My first article on the site! Pixel art has always been an aesthetic that I've enjoyed. From the games of old to the more modern pixel art that folks on the internet lovingly crafted. This is my addition to the wonderful art form.

[[/div]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Access File: 2020-650.goi" hide="-Leave File: 2020-650.goi"]]

[[div class="notation" style="margin: 1rem auto 1rem auto;"]]

[[div class="heading"]]
**File Designation:** UIU File: 2020-650

**Memetic Innoculation:** [*https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1d-aWMQuoS4 (♫)] - I Think I'm A Clone Now

**File Passphrase:** "To the agents who have decided to fuck everything up"

**File Description:** Over the course of writing the UIU has become one of my favorite GOIs (I say one of, nothing can ever come //close// to my boy Wilsons Wildlife) on the site. I spent about three months writing this, with about another half month reading up on UIU to get a good grip on the style, and I'm so happy to see it succeed! I'm also super happy to see that people generally seem to like Elliott Perez as I've gotten quite attached to him over the course of writing!
[[/div]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Access File: The_Serpent_And_The_Jailor.txt" hide="-Leave File: The_Serpent_And_The_Jailor.txt"]]

[[div class="notation" style="margin: 1rem auto 1rem auto;"]]

**File Designation:** The Serpent and the Jailor

**Memetic Innoculation:** [*https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mr1CM_yw68c (♫)] - Oak & Ash & Thorn

**File Passphrase:** "The Serpent had its sanctum
                                       The Jailor cried 'unfair!'
                                       For entry was forbidden
                                       Something the Jailor couldn't bear"


**File Description:** A poem about the Foundation, the Serpents Hand, the invasion of the Library, and Director Tilda Moose being a filthy traitor. Written in an ABAB rhyming style.

This is one I'm genuinely proud of, super happy to see that it was received well!

[[/div]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Access File: 6790.scp" hide="-Leave File: 6790.scp"]]

[[div class="notation" style="margin: 1rem auto 1rem auto;"]]

**File Designation:** SCP-6790

**Memetic Innoculation:** [*https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xA7e_dxDOCo&list=RDMM&index=7 (♫)] - Moby Duck

**File Passphrase"** "dado no magic man, dado not make one dissapear"

**File Description:** one day, [[*user Machen2]] walked up to me and say "dado make good things, dado also very much like ducks. so dado says to himself, why not make good thing that makes one into duck? so dado go and help very nice man do that thing." (he no say this but shh, dado keep secret)

dado had much fun writing, muchen vry fun co-author
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Access File: Ruiz_Dies_Again.txt" hide="-Leave File: Ruiz_Dies_Again.txt"]]

[[div class="notation" style="margin: 1rem auto 1rem auto;"]]

**File Designation:** Ruiz Dies Again

**Memetic Innoculation:** [*https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UIVe-rZBcm4 (♫)] - IN A GADDA DA VIDA

**File Passphrase:** “Ruiz pulled back and threw the hardest punch he could have delivered. Fuck that guy, and fuck his shitty copper.”

**File Description:** Cool War 2 never dies! Cool War has always been one of my favorite stories on the wiki and I was really sad to see that the Cool War 2 canon barely had any content. So I decided to actually write something for it! Hopefully, this slight uptick of content will lead to a full-blown Cool War Rennisaunce... please?

[[/div]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Access File: This_Chapter_Intentionally_Left_Blank.txt" hide="-Leave File: This_Chapter_Intentionally_Left_Blank.txt"]]

[[div class="notation" style="margin: 1rem auto 1rem auto;"]]

**File Designation:** This Chapter Intentionally Left Blank

**Memetic Innoculation:** [*https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kBraw3bzXEc (♫)] - Portal to the Void

**File Passphrase:** “I can't let this be all there is, I **won't** let this be all there is. It's not right! They can't imprison me while they stand idly by, I need to make, I need to create, I refuse to be trapped in this hell.”

**File Description:** My first dive into something a bit less silly. I'd like to say it's horror but I'm not entirely sure that's the right genre for whatever this is... anyways I think it's pretty nifty! Pattern Screamers have always seemed pretty radical so when I saw the title left open on the Cool War 2 hub I knew I had to take it, it also gave me a good opportunity to try something a little different with the transparent text. Also super glad I found a way to shove Joey into the tale, he was always one of my favorites. ​

[[/div]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Access File: Bonzo.goi" hide="-Leave File: Bonzo.goi"]]

[[div class="notation" style="margin: 1rem auto 1rem auto;"]]

**File Designation:** Critter Profile: Bonzo!

**Memetic Innoculation:** [*https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r0105ht0yoc (♫)] - Entry of the Gladiators, Op. 68

**File Passphrase:** “Bonzo entertaining some kiddos at one of his foster homes!”

**File Description:** I was a fan of clowns even before I joined the wiki so when I learned that a lot of folks around here don't like clown-related content I decided to write something out of spite. I started writing without a clear ending in mind, but when [[*user Valdevia]], an artist I really look up to, started working on a series on werewolves I decided to follow suit.

Massive thanks to Val for making that image and some equally big thanks to [[*user Luxaiko]] for helping me out of a money-related pinch!

[[/div]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Access File: Fights.txt " hide="-Leave File: Fights.txt"]]

[[div class="notation" style="margin: 1rem auto 1rem auto;"]]

**File Designation:** Fights

**Memetic Inoculation:** [*https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OZZn0YsqS2k&list=PLFrPKHSTSNzPASpF0PHpjz0wuI625FkaU&index=1 (♫)] - Lay 'Em Out!

**File Passphrase:** It took a step forward "Please, Mr. Sawyer, I request that you don't make this difficult. I believe it will be easier for everyone involved if you just come with me… willingly."

**File Description:** Yet more Cool War 2 content, I hope you're not bored yet! I had lots of fun with this one, the scene switching used here was a fun experiment for me and I'm super glad it turned out well. This is also my first tale with a lot of dialogue, which is something I've always had a lot of trouble with, so I'm super happy to see that it worked out here!

[[/div]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Access File: Star_Lover.goi" hide="-Leave File: Star_Lover.goi"]]

[[div class="notation" style="margin: 1rem auto 1rem auto;"]]

**File Designation:** Star Lover

**Memetic Inoculation:** [*https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=duoBnoqeazw (♫)] - We're All Going To Be Stars

**File Passphrase:** And now I'm dancing on the starlight
With you In my hand
I hold you so tightly
Oh it feels so grand

**File Description:** "Star Lover" has been a thing I've been working on since I've joined the site (not constantly, of course, on and off for a while as it collected dust in my drafts). Then, after a course of YouTube poetry lessons and the release of "The Serpent and the Jailor" I felt confident enough to completely rewrite it and toss it to some critters.

I'm pretty proud of this one and I'm glad the story of a guy going to see his giant star girlfriend found its place on the wiki.

[[/div]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Access File: La_Foi_De_La_Paix.goi" hide="-Leave File: La_Foi_De_La_Paix.goi"]]

[[div class="notation" style="margin: 1rem auto 1rem auto;"]]

**File Designation:** La Foi de La Paix, Circa 2011

**Memetic Inoculation:** [*https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NhsK5WExrnE (♫)] - T.N.T

**File Passphrase:** Let the fire in your heart engulf us both, for we're going to do great things. This, I am sure of.
 
**File Description:** A follow-up to my tale "Fights" and yet another dive into the Cool War 2 canon. For La Foi de La Paix I decided to write for a GOI not from the English branch so, after a long time reading through some content from other branches, I decided to use the "Medicea Accademia Dell'Arte Occulta" GOI from the lovely Italian branch! MADAO is a super cool group with a lot of potential, so It's a real shame that it doesn't have much written about it. Go check out the GOI [*http://scp-int.wikidot.com/gruppi-di-interesse#MADAO here!] I really do recommend it.
[[/div]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Access File: A_Collection_Of_Anomalous_Television_Programs_From_Beyond_The_Masquerade.txt" hide="-Leave File: A_Collection_Of_Anomalous_Television_Programs_From_Beyond_The_Masquerade.txt"]]

[[div class="notation" style="margin: 1rem auto 1rem auto;"]]

**File Designation:** A Collection of Anomalous Television Programs From Beyond the Masquerade

**Memetic Inoculation:** [*https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-n-zduNJ0t8 (♫)] - Generic 90's TV Music!

**File Passphrase:** "The breaking of the veil has led to many opportunities for anomalous individuals to create works of television without fear of containment by us or any other organization. With that being said it's still imperative that we monitor and document these programs for anything that could possibly cause harm to the general public."
 
**File Description:**  My addition to the Broken Masquerade canon. I always thought about how cool it would be to see how the reveal of the anomalous (and the inevitable rush to capitalize on it) would affect the media people consumed, such as television. So about a year ago, I pitched the idea to [[*user Sketchyth0ughts]], which sadly never went anywhere... until now, where I decided to brush off the dust it gained in the sandbox and made it a collab log. Go ahead, touch that dial, I don't mind.
[[/div]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Access File: A_Nightmare_Dreary.txt" hide="-Leave File: A_Nightmare_Dreary.txt"]]

[[div class="notation" style="margin: 1rem auto 1rem auto;"]]

**File Designation:** A Nightmare Dreary (The Bureaucrat)

**Memetic Inoculation:** [*https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-4beHOJduz8 (♫)] - Come Rest in this Bosom

**File Passphrase:** "I sign the form, I sign once more. I hear the footsteps approaching."
 
**File Description:** A collaborative effort between myself, [[*user DodoDevil]], [[*user LORDXVNV]], and [[*user LAN 2D]] written for the unofficial [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/nightmarefest NIGHTMAREFEST], in which Lord, Dodo, and I wrote a short poem each while Dodo made some absolutely amazing art. Had a great time writing this with everyone, so I hope you enjoy getting spooked reading it.
[[/div]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Access File: Oh_How_Brightly_The Moon_Shines_Over_The_Forest_Of_Green.txt" hide="-Leave File: Oh_How_Brightly_The Moon_Shines_Over_The_Forest_Of_Green.txt"]]

[[div class="notation" style="margin: 1rem auto 1rem auto;"]]

**File Designation:** Oh, How Brightly the Moon Shines Over the Forest of Green

**Memetic Inoculation:** [*https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RKXBvK34rgg (♫)] - Ravens in the Library

**File Passphrase:** "Do you see how brightly the moon shines over **##green|the forest of green##**? Its brilliant red dancing along the emerald canopy as the lords look on from their balconies stained with blood. Oh, my dear, how the crows see it so clearly."
 
**File Description:** An addition [[*user Luxaiko]]s amazing tale [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/goodnight-miss-moon Goodnight, Miss Moon]! Featuring a bit of lore not featured in that original article: the White Crow, the only white star in the entirety of Alagadda (created by [[*user luxaaj]]). Wishing on this white crow is said to allow you to exit out of Alagadda when you can't find a door (or can't leave for one reason or another). In my interpretation of this lore they laid out to me, wishing upon the white crow doesn't always work as well as using a door and as such might detour you through [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/taboo some unexpected locations].

[[/div]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Access File: Spider_Song_How_We_Stand_As_The_Universe_Collapses.txt" hide="-Leave File: Spider_Song_How_We_Stand_As_The_Universe_Collapses.txt"]]

[[div class="notation" style="margin: 1rem auto 1rem auto;"]]

**File Designation:** Spider Song (How We Stand as the Universe Collapses)

**Memetic Inoculation:** [*https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7X1wQ4LSW-s (♫)] - Spider Girl

**File Passphrase:** Critters crawling
Through the endless void
Webs unravel
Universe destroyed
 
**File Description:** A gift for [[*user CelesteKara]] made during the [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/forum/t-14303381/10th-annual-holiday-art-exchange 10th Annual Art Exchange]! This year Kara requested for something relating to their absolutely amazing [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6600 SCP-6600], so I did just that, in the form of an ABCB poem. Really glad I got Kara for this one because-- despite what everyone else says-- spiders rock.... anyhow, happy holidays everyone!

[[/div]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+Access File: 900.scp" hide="-Leave File: 900.scp"]]

[[div class="notation" style="margin: 1rem auto 1rem auto;"]]

**File Designation:** SCP-900

**Memetic Inoculation:** [*https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6P8mfvCGKyg (♫)] - Sun Song

**File Passphrase:** "A woman, human by the looks of her. She was walking down the hill towards us, saying something in a language I didn't recognize. She started to point at us and screamed some things, and that's when Saxony broke."
 
**File Description:** A collaborative effort between [[*user LizardWizard]] and myself to rewrite [[*user Cherry Pict]]'s article, SCP-900! After about five months of hard work, we finally reached the point where we were both super happy with the end product. Also, I gotta say it's honestly really cool to actually have a Series 1 article under my belt, never would have guessed it would happen when I first started! Hope you enjoy it as much as we do!

[[/div]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab Achivements!]]

[[=]]
[[include component:sybadge code=lgbt]]
[[include component:sybadge code=awb]]
